mapper.select: SELECT cod_trab as cod_trab, cod_rol as cod_rol, num_ruc as nro_ruc, raz_soc as razon_soc, nom_trab as nom_trab, ape_trab as ape_trab, dni_trab as dni_trab, email_trab as email_trab, tlf_trab as telf_trab, dir_trab as dire_trab, username as username, paswoord as paswoord FROM tb_trabajador WHERE username = #{username}
